commit message:
Check if AsyncTask is running when refreshing comments

Check if the task is already running to avoid an exception when
executing. Ideally there should be a check for isCancelled in
doInBackground so the task can be cancelled and then re-run.

Signed-off-by: Michael Shick <mike@shick.in>
